entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow or ice pellets late this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Fog patches before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
